channel.title: Authors on Landfried
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Landfried

item.description: PhD in computer science (defense 2023) and MSc in social anthropologist, I am a Bayesian Inference Engineer working on causal reasoning under uncertainty. In contrast to ad-hoc solutions, the strict application of probability theory (Bayesian approach) guarantees inter-subjective agreements in contexts of uncertainty, the foundation of empirical truths. Although it is known to be the correct logic for the empirical sciences, its adoption was historically limited due to its high computational cost.
